mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MESSAGE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_USERNAME, MEM_NICKNAME, MEM_REGION1, MEM_REGION2, MEM_REGDATE, MEM_IMAGE, MEM_GENDER, MEM_LATEST, REPORT_ID AS memReport_id FROM MEMBER) ON MEM_SENDER_ID = MEM_ID WHERE MEM_RECEIVER_ID = #{mem_id} AND ISDELETE = 0

SELECT * FROM MESSAGE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_USERNAME, MEM_NICKNAME, MEM_REGION1, MEM_REGION2, MEM_REGDATE, MEM_IMAGE, MEM_GENDER, MEM_LATEST, REPORT_ID AS memReport_id FROM MEMBER) ON MEM_RECEIVER_ID = MEM_ID WHERE MEM_SENDER_ID = #{mem_id} AND ISDELETE = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE (MES_ID, MEM_SENDER_ID, MEM_RECEIVER_ID, MES_TITLE, MES_CONTENT, MES_REGDATE, MES_ISREAD, MES_STATUS, ISDELETE) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(MES_ID),0)+1 FROM MESSAGE WHERE MEM_SENDER_ID = #{mem_sender_id} AND MEM_RECEIVER_ID = #{mem_receiver_id}), #{mem_sender_id}, #{mem_receiver_id}, #{mes_title}, #{mes_content}, SYSDATE, 0, 301, 0)
